video.name: Disconnected
video.description: Be part of something great. You belong here! At Glee Church, our mission is to share the love of Jesus Christ and to reach the unchurched.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: Self Esteem
video.description: In Part 2 of our series, The Mind, we learn about self esteem.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: Passion
video.description: Be part of something great. You belong here! At Glee Church, our mission is to share the love of Jesus Christ and to reach the unchurched.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: What's So Special About Him
video.description: In this message we learn about why Jesus is so special. There is none like him.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: A Life Without Meaning
video.description: Be part of something great. You belong here! At Glee Church, our mission is to share the love of Jesus Christ and to reach the unchurched.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: There's Beauty in Giving
video.description: In Part 1 of our series, The Heart, we learn that there's beauty in giving.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: Living a Generous Life
video.description: In Part 2 of our series, The Heart, we continue to learn about how to be generous and giving of ourselves.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: Stop Hiding Your Struggles
video.description: Be part of something great. You belong here! At Glee Church, our mission is to share the love of Jesus Christ and to reach the unchurched.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: Don't Walk Away From Your Destiny
video.description: In this message, we learn about how to walk in our destiny.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: God Wants You
video.description: In the final part of our series, The Heart, we continue to learn about how to be generous and giving of ourselves.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: It Stops Here
video.description: In Week 1 of our series, Limitations, we learned about how we must not let fear block our blessings. We must have faith over fear.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: Pride Is A Dangerous Thing
video.description: In Week 2 of our series, Limitations, we learned about how pride can be a hindrance in our lives. We should put our pride aside and come humbly before God.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: Faithfulness In Serving | Service is Mindset
video.description: In Part 1 of our series, Our Heart For The House , we learn about the beauty in serving.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: You Can't Cancel Wat You Didn't Create
video.description: In Part 2 of our series, Our Heart For The House , we talk about relationships and loving all of those around us.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: How Should We Worship?
video.description: In Part 3 of our series, Our Heart For The House , we learn about the various ways we can worship the Lord.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: This is Your Season! | Be Intentional
video.description: In the finale of our series, Baggage , we learn about being intentional. We learn that we must trust God and prepare for our season!
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: Who Is Your Neighbor? | Love Your Neighbor As Yourself
video.description: In part 1 of our series, neighborhood watch , we learn that we must expand our community and love our neighbors.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley

video.name: Don't Walk By Your Blessings | Hidden Blessings
video.description: In part 2 of our series, neighborhood watch , we learn that many times we walk right by our blessings. We must sometimes step out of our comfort zone to reach the blessing that God has for us.
video.speaker: Pastor Lorenzo A. Moseley
